tool_input.command:
# Backup existing hooks
mv .claude/hooks .claude/hooks_backup
mkdir -p .claude/hooks

# Test copying bundled hooks manually to verify the process
for hook in code_agent/bundled/hooks/*.py; do
    cp "$hook" .claude/hooks/
    chmod +x ".claude/hooks/$(basename "$hook")"
    echo "✅ Deployed: $(basename "$hook")"
done

echo "🔍 Verification:"
ls -la .claude/hooks/

tool_response.stdout:
